nodes.text: The father of Lando Calrissian was one of the parents of Lando Calrissian. One piece of advice that he gave his son was, "You can't think deeper than your pockets."
Before being signed on as Mace Windu for Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, Samuel L. Jackson was slated to appear in a cameo role as Grando Calrissian, Lando's father.

Raan Calrissian, who appears in the young-reader's book The Clone Wars: Decide Your Destiny: Tethan Battle Adventure and is an adult in 21 BBY, visits Cloud City and has a contact on Socorro, but no source mentions if he and Lando are related.

"The Phantom Clone," an episode of the non-canon animated series LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles, introduces Lindo Calrissian as Lando's father. Lindo owns the Millennium Falcon and is voiced by Lando's actor, Billy Dee Williams.
